headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and modal titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, form labels, and data tables.

mono.usage: Use for property IDs, transaction codes, and technical specs.

primary.name: Deep Forest
primary.usage: Brand headers, primary navigation, active states for tabs.

secondary.name: Warm Stone
secondary.usage: Page backgrounds, secondary buttons, card backgrounds.

rules: Overlap images with text blocks using negative margins.
Use 'stone-50' background for the dashboard area to differentiate from white cards.
Cards must have sharp corners or minimal rounding (rounded-md).
Dense data tables with sticky headers.

forms.layout: Split Screen (Left: Form, Right: Live Preview)
rules: Group related fields into 'Fieldsets' with clear legends.
Use 'stone-100' for input backgrounds to make them distinct from the white card.
Validation messages must be inline and clear.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Wizard' form pattern for the 'Create Listing' page. Do not dump all fields on one page.
Use the 'Deep Forest' green (#064e3b) sparingly for high-impact headers and primary navigation.
Ensure the Dashboard uses the 'Bento Grid' layout with 'Warm Stone' backgrounds.
Use the provided image URLs for the Landing Page hero and feature sections.
For the 'Property Detail' page, use a large masonry grid for the image gallery.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
